name: Madoka Magica - Parallel world
description:
Game made in html5 and javascript in 2020.

This game was inspired by the Madoka Magica animation series and the game Grief Syndrome. 

When two of the magical girls discover that they would all become witches, they decide to kill all the magical girls before so they won't become witches in the future. That is why Madoka must face them. Finally we must defeat Kyubey, who had been deceiving them and thus avoid continuing with her plans. 

CONTROLS:

Movement: A - D, left - right arrows.

Shot: left mouse click

Silvia Osoro García
